verbose_text: The SSB repair defect in these XRCC1 gene edited cells was effectively rescued by expression of either of the residue 399 polymorphic variants of EGFP-XRCC1, but not by the PAR binding defective R335A, K369A double mutant (XREF_FIG C).
evidence: SSB repair defect in these XRCC1 gene-edited cells was effectively rescued by expression of either of the residue 399 polymorphic variants of EGFP-XRCC1, but not by the PAR-binding defective
